entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Lewisporte
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:46 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -11.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gander Int'l Airport 11:30 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -11.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -14.2°C
Wind: WNW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 12 except minus 16 inland.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with drizzle ending near midnight then partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 12 except minus 16 inland. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
